NewsItem.HEADLINE: Macro Base Station Transceivers 2018 Forecast Update 2 (Excel File) with Research Notes (PDF)
NewsItem.SUMMARY: Macro Base Station Transceiver forecast update for August 2018. Includes shipment and market share breakdowns by technology
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: The five-year forecast update includes an Excel spreadsheet and a one-page bullet list to show what changed this quarter. Forecast breakdowns include base stations by air interface, base stations by architecture, capacity deployed by generation, RRH units by air interface, and radio transceivers by power level, by band, by air interface, by generation, by massive MIMO type, and multiple others. Market share is shown for each air interface separately.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: macro base station forecast transceiver radio rrh market estimates
